mapper.select: select count(*) from board b inner join member m on b.mno = m.mno where btype = "문의"
select *, (select count(*) from icmtReply i where i.bno=b.bno) as replyCnt from board b inner join member m on b.mno = m.mno where btype = "문의" order by bno desc limit ${start-1},#{perPage}
select * from board where bno < #{value} and btype = "문의" order by bno desc limit 1

select mno from member where mid = #{value}
